resources.string: It would be really helpful if you rate myPoli on Google Play
Schedule & organize repeating tasks better with Repeating Quests. Start by creating your first one.
Organize projects & achieve goals with Challenges. Create one, set a deadline and get it done!
Build good Habits or avoid bad ones. Create your first Habit now and start building your streak!
Players who share their Challenges with friends are up to 5x more likely to complete them
Time to add your first Quest
Something went wrong, please try again later!
Hey, look what I found. It is a really cool time management app!
Signing in allows you to back up all your data in the cloud so you can use your myPoli account on all your devices
myPoli needs internet to sign you in!
I hope that this will be quick and painless
myPoli needs to read your calendars to import your events as quests
Rate myPoli on Google Play and share your opinion
What do you think of myPoli …
Not enough coins to buy this
Enable all power-ups (incl. all future ones)
Challenges help you plan and achieve your life goals. Create challenges for all your short and long-term goals. Then you can track your progress and stay motivated.
Find the perfect work-fun balance by measuring your monthly and weekly productivity. Complete your Challenges faster and spend more time in the flow.
Stay organized and clear your mind
Add simple notes to your quests to help you remember important information.
Don\'t know where your time flies? Monitor it by tracking your quests duration or use it as a timer for your Pomodoros, fitness activities or cooking recipes.
Be more productive by dividing your tasks into smaller pieces. Define steps, subtasks or even create shopping lists.
Add reminders to your quests. No need to look at your phone or watch all the time, focus on the current task and myPoli will notify you when the next one comes.
Choose your own time intervals for quests. The minimum value is 10 minutes. The maximum is still 4 hours. If you need longer value, then try to divide your quest into shorter quests.
Allows to add more than one value to track for your Challenges which allows you to track progress towards what matters most
Оnly english letters, digits and underscores

Investor, #BTC owner, Fish brain researcher, Foodie, Blogger, World Traveler, Really modest
I can\'t get no sleep, in the 40 minutes a day that I must be fed constantly
I am just a regular cutie. Plus, I might or might not ate all my previous owners!
Some say that I\'m just a myth, designed to scare ponies and unicorns. I say - they might be right!
My parents left me at your planet 5000 years ago. They will take me back any time now!
Originally from a place with high Cannabis produce. Got caught wearing a coat with lotsa, well you know…
Once upon a time, a loving Eastern European family started taking care of me. I had to disappear, fast!
I love spending long Sundays on tea parties, charity meetings, reading clubs & deep fried fish restaurants
Some say that I might not be the brightest around. How come I landed such a hot Dragon girlfriend then?
I remember the day I arrived from Africa like it was yesterday. Too bad I don\'t remember yesterday at all…
My mom always told me that I must not be from this world, later the Doc found she was a swan.
I am just a regular \"Love Yourself\" home builder that likes the occasional upstream swim & whole food

# My awesome note\n Markdown notes are really amazing! Create yours now!
Organize Quests & Challenges better with Tags. Start by creating one now.
This Tag has no Quest buddies. Why not add some?
Maximum of 10 favorite tags are allowed
Tags help you separate different types of tasks so you can search & follow progress easily
Have a question? Found a bug or just want to say hi?
Tasks without a scheduled date will be put here. myPoli will help you schedule and get them done!
Please, allow myPoli to show over other apps for cute Reminders
PRO membership unlocks all PowerUps & more (%d day FREE trial)

The days were getting darker. Procrastination started winning more and more battles. One day, something really mesmerising came down from the clouds.

It was nothing that the world has seen before - it was evil and really slow! Dramatic entrance should happen about now…

\
\- I am winning the war against productivity and happy life! Nobody can stop me now! Hahaha, ohh my tummy hurts - I just finished eating my snail soup.\n\n
Suddenly, a couple of stars started shining in the sky. YOU and your cute pet appeared from the dark, you were ready to fight. There was hope! Hope for an awesome world!

Welcome Hero! A great evil is upon our world! Its minions are already here and the silent war is waging everywhere. Unfortunately, we\'re losing - more and more people are falling victim to procrastination, couch potating and dumbification. Desperate time calls for desperate measures, so you are going to battle! First, you must tell me how should I call you and choose your battle avatar. Choose wisely, you can\'t change your username later!

You\'re going to war against the evilest thing of them all - \"The Evil Snail\", emperor of procrastination and lazy-buttness. You can use all the help you can get!\n\nYour new Pet will help you throughout your journey by keeping you motivated and giving you bonus rewards. Choose your Pet and its name now.
Did you achieve anything yesterday? You can log your progress now.
You\'re gonna rock today. Start by adding your first Quest now.
Invite your friends to myPoli and crush your Challenges together!
Looking for my biscuits… Have you seen em?
We might have a problem here
Please, connect to Internet to continue
Please, contact us now to get this fixed!

You haven\'t added any Habits yet

Do you really want to remove this repeating quest?
Do you really want to remove this challenge?
Do you really want to remove this habit?
Do you really want to complete this challenge?
Removing the tracked value will remove all data logs. Do you want to continue?

These are all your **unscheduled quests** (no date).

 When you use **Plan Day**, your not completed quests are transferred here. 

 You can also use this list for ideas and things you do not want to forget but don't know when exactly you want to do them.

You can add your repeating tasks as **Repeating Quests** if they have a longer duration or as **Habits**. Separate you habits as: 

 * **Good habits** - you can do them more times a day and complete them to get a reward - **Life coins** and **XP**


* **Bad habits** - uncheck them if you fail to resist the temptation. MyPoli will punish you by taking **Life coins** and **xp** from your inventory

 You see your current streak and if it is your best there is a star.

This is your personal **pet** who will help you in your journey! 

 Your pet gives you 3 types of bonuses - more **Life coins**, **XP** and **rewards**.

 The happier your pet is, the bigger bonuses you get. If you let your pet to **die**, you will not get a lot of Life coins. You can always revive it with gems. If you want even bigger bonuses, equip your pet with different **items**.

 Feed your pet to keep it **healthy**. A healthy pet is a happy pet. There are three types of pets - **carnivorous**, **herbivorous** and **omnivorous**, so be careful with the type of the food.


Every midnight your pet **loses** some **healthy points** depending on your completed quests during the day - busier schedule means less lost points.

From this screen you can:

 * Use the timer to track how you spend your time. There are 2 timer types - **Pomodoro** (25 min work + 5 min break) and simple **Countdown**

 * Create and manage checklist for your quest (**sub-quests**)

Repeating quests are your **repeating tasks**. 

 They can repeat **daily**, **weekly**, **monthly** and **yearly**.

 They are also:

 * **Fixed** - repeat exactly on the days you've selected

 * **Flexible** - myPoli scheduled it for you


If the duration of your task is too small, make it a **habit** instead of repeating quest.

Challenges are your short and long-term **goals**. 

 Use them to clearly define what you want, why you want it and by what date you will achieve it.

 Divide your epic challenges into smaller tasks - **quests**, **repeating quests** and **habits** or accept one of myPoli **Preset challenges**.

 Complete your challenges to win more **Life coins** and **XP**.

Monitor your **daily**, **weekly** and **monthly** progress.

 With the help of **statistics**, you can keep track of how you handle your quests. You can see which quests take longer and whether there is a **balance** in your everyday life. Do you spend too much working time and not enough for your family? 


Find out how you spend your time in other apps. **Do you waste your time?**

\

**Organize** your quests easily with tags. Define your own tags with **colors** and **icons**. The **number** in the top right corner means how many quests you have with this tag. A quest can have more than one tag.

 Your **favorite** tags appear in your drawer. 

 If you need more than 5 tags, you can always use a **power up**.

* **Power-ups** - they help you organize and complete your tasks easier. You can buy them **only with Life coins**.

 * **Membership** - unlock all features with a subscription.

 * **Pets**, **Avatars**, **Colors**, **Icons** and **Themes** are all bought with **Gems**. You can convert **Life Coins** to **Gems** or just buy them.

Every morning, choose your **3 most important quests** for the day.

 By defining and **prioritising** your tasks you are much more likely to complete them.

 You can choose your quests from here or when you are planning your day with **Plan Day**.

 You can adjust challenge days in **Settings -> Days to plan**.

 By completing your Daily Challenge myPoli will reward you with **Life coins** and **XP**.

This is an overview of your previous day. You can:

 * **Swipe** not completed quest **right** to **complete** it

 * **Swipe** not completed quest **left** to **reschedule** it

 * **Swipe** completed quest right to mark it as **not completed**

 * **Log** more quest for yesterday with the **Add** button. Add more things you do in myPoli so you can **track your time** better and use the **Growth** section.


Your **Awesomeness Grade** depends on your quests count, duration and if they are completed. Try to be **more productive** to get a higher grade.


Tap **Plan Day** to start planing your current schedule.

This is an overview of your schedule for today.

 **Suggestions** section - myPoli offers you some quests from your **Bucket List** (quests you forgot to do or don't know when to do). Add them to your schedule with the **+** button.

 **My Day** section. You can: 

 * Mark quest as part of your **Daily Challenge** with the star (choose only 3 quests)

 * **Swipe** quest **right** to **reschedule** it 

 * **Swipe** quest **left** to **delete** it

 * **Add** more quests to your schedule with the big add button


Tap **Start My Day** to complete planning your day. In **Settings** you can adjust the days and time you want to plan your day.

You have **health points** like your pet. When you complete your quests, habits and daily challenge you increase your health. Procrastination will decrease it and make you sick. Stay productive and be careful not to **die** because you will **lose 1 level and all your Life Coins**.


The **yellow bar** is your **level** and **experience** progress. Level up to increase your rank and to win more bonuses and rewards. You can see your **current and next rank**.

 You can change your **avatar** or edit your **display name** and **short bio**. This is how your friends will see your profile. 

 You can also manage your **shared posts**, **friends** and **shared challenges**.

 **High Reward Quests & Habits per day** show how much of each you have left to complete and get high rewards for. You can still complete more if you want to, but the rewards will be significantly smaller.

 **Average focus hours per day** is formed by how much time you've tracked with the **timer** (both pomodoro and countdown).

These are your physical and mental characteristics.

 Each attribute has its own points, level, and **rank**. **Leveling up** the attribute's rank will give you more bonuses and rewards. In the **Bonuses** list you can see what you've already unlocked and what are the next you'll get. 


To **activate** the attribute you have to assign **tags** to it. 

 Each attribute can have no more than **3 tags** and each tag can be assigned to no more than **3 attributes**. When you tag your quests and habits and complete them, you win **points** for the attributes.

Inspire & be inspired by your friends and the myPoli community!

 **Share** your **Challenges** and let them **track your progress** and **motivate** you to complete them.

 Make your Challenge shared or post a completed quest from the big **Add button**(bottom right)

 **Invite** your friends by sending them a **link** from the top **Add friend** button.

 When they open the link and **accept** your invitation, you'll become friends in myPoli. 

 You can also track their progress, react to their posts, comment and encourage them in their Quests.
You have no Habits for today

All Quests done for today. Yay!
You got done every Quest yesterday
Complete your Daily Habits from your home screen. The widget provides you a simple and easy way to manage your habits for the day.
Power-Up is required for this widget
Create new Habits as much as you want or choose from the presets. Stay productive, build amazing Habits that stick or get rid of the bad ones!
Sync all your Calendars right into myPoli and make your schedule complete. No more missed events & meetings!
Avg. focus hours per day (last 7 days)
You lost all your health. The The Evil Snail caught you and locked you in his dungeon!
A measure of how physically powerful you are. Associate your fitness Quests & Habits with this attribute.
A measure of how wise, creative & witty you are. Associate your studying, reading and possibly work-related Quests & Habits with this attribute.
A measure of how well developed your social skills are. Associate hanging out with friends & family, visiting movies, museums and concerts with this attribute.
A measure of how well you\'re developing your skills. Associate learning a new language, how to program, knitting or swimming Quests with this attribute.
A measure of how well you\'re taking care of yourself. Associate relaxation, mindfulness, de-stress and other health-related Quests with this attribute.
A measure of your mental resistance and tenacity. Associate chores & Quests that contribute towards completing your Challenges with this attribute.
This attribute is inactive. Activate it by adding a Tag.
Increase health regeneration by 20% when completing a Quest

Quests & Habits from Repeating Quests and Challenges give more XP & Life Coins
Planning your day gives XP & Life Coins
Streaks of Repeating Quests & Habits increase XP & Life Coins

At least one Tag is required. Adding Tags will allow you to earn attributes when completing Quests & Habits from this Challenge.
The information below is used to personalize your diet Challenge. Required calories, protein, carbs & fat are calculated for you!

Ahem… *finishing its biscuit*. Hey there, rookie! The war against the Evil Snail is raging and I am really busy! I\'ll explain everything later. Let me help you get started. *Looking for another biscuit*
